Item.name: Geo
Item.Property: A sampling of MrSID images from LizardTech's customers who work with geographic imagery.

Item.name: MODIS
Item.Property: A composite of four months of MODIS observations, with a spatial resolution of 1000m/pixel.

Item.name: Missouri_NIR
Item.Property: This is the same dataset as "Missouri_RGB" but renders the NIR-G-B combination

Item.name: Missouri_RGB
Item.Property: This RGB-NIR satellite data has been compressed into MG4 and reprojected into EPSG 2817 (NAD83(HARN) / Missouri West). Here we display the R-G-B combination. Note how the Alpha band causes transparency at the corners
